section.name: Built-in directives
section.p: Directives are probably the most useful part in anycode generation. Below, you'll find a set of functions and functions that you can use directly in you template code. More directives for various languages in the future releases. See the Roadmap for details.
If you want to see details about directives, please go to Anycode API Online Javadoc

tr.td: Provides functions to render attributes, getters, setters, operations.
Automates code generation fragments for JPA2/Hibernate implementation.
Automates code generation fragments for spring implementations. At the moment it is only used to inject spring-data dependencies for services and JPA entities.
